summary: REQ-1 requires adding the address as plain text in the Contact page with no additional contact details. The diff shows the address was added to Contact.tsx, but also includes a gold banner with real phone and email as clickable links, which violates the constraint of not adding other contact details.

hallucinated_features.description: A gold banner below the header displaying real phone and email as clickable links was added to the Contact page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states no phone number or email should be added to the Contact section, and no additional contact details other than the specified address should be included. The file summary confirms 'a gold banner below the header displaying the real phone and email as clickable links' was added.
